description: Wearing a cream-colored hoodie that matches his socks, Draven Torres bows and kneels on one knee in front of Leo Forte. Passing one end of the cord through a ring hanging from the ceiling, Leo hoists Draven into the air. Unable to do anything except swing back and forth, Draven is reduced to moaning and wishing he could touch himself ? a pleasure Leo denies him as he pulls his cock out and drenches Draven's hairy hole with cream.
title: Hoodies, Scene #06
